replies.body:
The way the bracket is set up is misleading. The top 2 teams in the bracket don't play they advance and play their counterpart from the other bracket.

So TSM will go up against SKT and RNG will go up against whoever wins the group b losers bracket

> [{quoted}](name=Stillname,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=52gOzh1a,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-05T20:58:19.059+0000)
>
> The way the bracket is set up is misleading. The top 2 teams in the bracket don't play they advance and play their counterpart from the other bracket.
> 
> So TSM will go up against SKT and RNG will go up against whoever wins the group b losers bracket

That is pretty misleading ....

> [{quoted}](name=SuperJediNinja,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=52gOzh1a,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-05T20:59:58.930+0000)
>
> That is pretty misleading ....

Yep, it was the same way last year, a lot of people were confused because the bracket on the site made it look like the winner of the loser's bracket would face the winner of the winner's bracket from the same group again. So alot of people thought TSM would play WE, and GE would play YOE.
I think tomorrow is the last day of the event so every remaining games should be played tomorrow.
